title: Cubus
author: Cubus
content: Official BeaRex bounty campaign  Rewards from 0.1 USD to 10 USD per task Special reward for completing up to +50% for participants who complete all tasks!  Bounty Rules:• Rewards will be distributed every month, on 15th.• We leave ourselves the right to remove you from campaign if we think that you are cheating or spamming.• We can refuse to let you participate in our campaign for any reason.• You cannot unfollow our social networks while the bounty program is active.Length: 1 month Twitter Follow Bounty Campaign :• Follow our official twitter page (twitter.com/BeaRex_io)• Retweet our pinned post on your page• Leave any comment in this Bitcointalk post• Reward for this task 0.25 USDT per account - number of accounts unlimited • Fill the form right there with your personal information • Check out your confirmation status in this spreadsheet  • On this month only 500 first users recieve a reward Discord Follow Bounty Campaign :• Follow our official Discord server (discord.gg/C7zjcUer)• Get verificated status• Leave any comment in this Bitcointalk post• Reward for this task 0.25 USDT per account - number of accounts unlimited • Fill the form right there with your personal information • Check out your confirmation status in this spreadsheet  • On this month only 500 first users recieve a reward

comments.author: wmaurik
comments.body: If this is about a Bounty campaign program with a certain fee for each participant. It's better if you make a post in the sub forum Bounties (Altcoins) because there are already so many Bounties posted by many managers and also it has become a special place for any Bounty program.So immediately move it by pressing the move topic menu at the bottom.
